INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Significant decrease of the concentrations of amprenavir that could lead to a loss of the virological response
In the absence of the administration at the same time with a strong inhibitor of CYP3A4, decrease of the concentrations of maraviroc by the inducer
INTERACTION.COMMENT: The dose of maraviroc must be increased to 600 mg twice a day in this situation.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the concentrations of maraviroc by the inhibitor
INTERACTION.COMMENT: The dose of maraviroc must be reduced to 150 mg twice a day if it is taken with this inhibitor.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the plasma concentrations of maraviroc that could lead to a loss of the virological response
